The country was torn by warlordism , with each warlord dominating a region.

sentences.en: Zhang insisted local autonomy is the only way to protect autocracy or rule by warlord.
sentences.cn: 根据他的意见,地方自治让政治权力多元化,而且防止专制与军阀统治.
